description: Solo studio shipping software products fast — launching, learning, and iterating until something sticks.

display.usage: Hero titles, project names, section headings, philosophy text

body.usage: Navigation, labels, body text, all functional type

projects.name: Cover
projects.description: Automates studio attendance reports into professional invoices. Built for independent instructors who'd rather teach than do admin.

projects.name: Nudge
projects.description: A reminder app that actually syncs. Set it on your phone, get it on your desktop. Simple, persistent, everywhere.

projects.name: Placed
projects.description: See artwork on your walls before you buy. Snap your room, choose a piece, and visualize it in context with AI-powered rendering.

projects.name: Latent Wonder
projects.description: Experiments at the intersection of generative AI and human creativity. Where latent space meets wonder.

principles.title: Small bets, fast loops
principles.description: Launch in weeks, not months. Every product is a hypothesis — the market is the only judge that matters.

principles.title: Revenue is signal
principles.description: Downloads and stars are vanity. Someone paying you money is the only proof that you've solved a real problem.

principles.title: Kill fast, double down slow
principles.description: Most projects should die young. When one gets traction, that's when patience and craft kick in.

principles.title: Stay default alive
principles.description: No fundraising. No burn rate. Build from revenue, keep costs near zero, and own every decision.

philosophy: Most ideas fail. That's the point. Ship enough products, and the market tells you which one deserves your next decade. Volume is the strategy.
